def_en: Pagan beliefs and activities do not belong to any of the main religions of the world and take nature and a belief in many gods as a basis. They are older, or are believed to be older, than other religions.

def_cn: 异教徒（旧时指不信奉基督教的人）
def_en: In former times, pagans were people who did not believe in Christianity and who many Christians considered to be inferior people.
